parser

Class ChessRules

  • java.lang.Object
    • parser.ChessRules

  • public class ChessRules
extends java.lang.Object
    Regroups the chess rules for each pieces and special moves.
    Author:
    Paul Chaignon

    • Method Detail

      • check

        static boolean check(ChessBoard board,
            BoardPiece.PieceColor kingColor)
              throws IncorrectFENException
        Sees if board is in check state for a player.
        Parameters:
        board - The chess board.
        kingColor - The color of the player to check for check.
        Returns:
        True if the board is in check state.
        Throws:
        IncorrectFENException - If the FEN is incorrect.

      • eval

        static BoardSquare eval(BoardPiece.PieceType piece,
               ChessBoard board,
               BoardPiece.PieceColor color,
               char fromX,
               int fromY,
               char toX,
               int toY,
               boolean capture)
                 throws IncorrectFENException
        Found the position of a piece on the board. If the origin coordinates are missing, it will find them by using the movement rules. Call the right method depending on the piece type. Note: Added to convert eval method from JavaScript.
        Parameters:
        piece - The piece type.
        board - The chess board.
        color - The piece color.
        fromX - The original abscissa.
        fromY - The original ordinate.
        toX - The destination abscissa.
        toY - The destination ordinate.
        capture - True if there is a capture.
        Returns:
        The board square.
        Throws:
        IncorrectFENException - If the FEN is incorrect.
